participant_1.background:
I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
i write fiction for fun.
my favorite movie is pretty woman.
i like to write my own songs.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my ability to stay humble and grounded even when I'm on top of the world.
i am a member of four book clubs , the pta , and two bunch groups.
I am passionate about serving my country, but I would like to find a job that is closer to home so that I can spend more time with my family.
I watch Jimmy Fallon to cheer up
My family is a little bit on the crazy side, but we love each other very much.

content.text: I am doing well! I just found out I am going to be a mother soon!
Congratulations! That is such exciting news!
Thank you! I am so happy! I have been wanting to be a mother for a long time.
I can tell! You seem like you would be a great mother.
Thank you! I am going to do my best.
I am sure you will. What are you doing to prepare for the baby?
I am reading a lot of books and taking a birthing class. I am also trying to get my house ready for the baby.
That sounds like a lot of work! But it will be worth it when you hold your baby in your arms.
I know it will! I am so excited!
I am excited for you too
